briefdescription.para: Load Boozer data and prepare parameters for offload.

detaileddescription.para: This function fills the boozer offload struct with parameters and allocates and fills the offload array. Sets offload array length in the offload struct.

The offload data struct should be fully initialized before calling this function and offload array should hold the input data in order [psi, nu, theta_bzr]. This function fits splines to input data, reallocates the offload array and stores spline coefficients there.

Multidimensional arrays must be stored as
nu(psi_i, thetabzr_j) = array[j*npsi + i]
theta_bzr(psi_i, thetageo_j) = array[j*npsi + i]
psi(R_i, z_j) = array[j*nR + i]

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array

briefdescription.para: Initialize boozer data struct on target.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to data struct on target
pointer to pointer to offload array

memberdef.argsstring: (real psithetazeta[12], int *isinside, real r, real phi, real z, B_field_data *Bdata, boozer_data *boozerdata)
memberdef.name: boozer_eval_psithetazeta
